message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and we can negotiate from here.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going all the way to 50/50 just yet.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much. Let's meet in the middle.
I'm getting closer to the middle, but I still want a bit more. This is my last offer before I make a stronger move.
